title: Perfect Square
text: This equation is a perfect square
speech: This equation is a perfect square

title: Common Factor
speech: Take out the 3u to make ; 10 p; open paren; 9 p squared, plus 30 p q, plus 25 q squared; close paren;

title: Factors
text: In this equation $$z\left({ax}^2+bx+c\right)$$ the square root of a and c are $$3$$ and 5q respectively.
speech: In this equation ; z; open paren, a x squared, plus b x plus c; close paren;  the square root of a and c are  3;  and 5q respectively.

title: Plug in
text: Plug into the perfect square simplified form $${z\left(nx+m\right)}^2$$ where $$n$$ is the square root of a and $$m$$ is the square root of c
speech: Plug into the perfect square simplified form ; z, open paren, n x plus m, close paren squared;  where  n  is the square root of a and  m;  is the square root of c
